scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists of approximately 45 letters, in German, from Johann Cohen of Dortmund to his relatives Lawrence "Hans" and Adi Hammer of New York City. While the principal topics of the letters appear to be postwar conditions and family matters, it is possible that either/both Cohen and L. Hammer were IB veterans.
